me_no_target: Who were you going to tag, then?
me_self: Unable to catch anyone else, you do the intelligent thing and tag yourself. You're still IT!
actor_room: $n casts about for someone to tag.
actor_self: Unable to catch anyone else, $n tags $mself.  Are you impressed?
actor_other: $n dives from the shadows and TAGS $N.  $N IS IT!
actor_me: $n pounces on you and >>> TAGS <<< you!  You're IT!
me_actor: >From nowhere, you pounce on $N and TAG $M remorselessly!  BWAHAHA!!!
